verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H8050><s%>, when Samuel was old <S%H2204><s%>, that he made <S%H7760><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

that we also may be like all the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and that our king <S%H4428><s%> may judge <S%H8199><s%> us <S%H3318><s%>, and go out before <S%H6440><s%> us <S%H3898><s%>, and fight our battles <S%H4421><s%>.

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the men <S%H582><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> ye every man <S%H582><s%> unto his city <S%H5892><s%>.
